attributes.action: Change police sirens to the Benny Hill theme music.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As crimes appear to be occuring more and more often in Major Cities accross the UK, you tend to hear more Police sirens responding to emergancy call outs as the current sound they produce is frankly annoying at 4 in the morning and gets lost in the mayhem of city life during the day I appeal that we change the Sirens on Police Vehicles to the more relaxing sound of the Benny Hill police theme music.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
